      • getDevice

        public ConnectedDevice getDevice(Method currentMethod,
                                 String testContext,
                                 boolean attachDevice,
                                 String personaName)
        This will cycle through the available devices, by weight, to locate a device that has not run this method yet.
        Parameters:
        currentMethod - The current test method
        testContext - the test context
        attachDevice - the attach device
        personaName - the persona name
        Returns:
        The next available device or null if no device are available
